summary:
The biggest crime against history of farming. Avoiding anachronism of bales.
Simple mesh replacer to turn all bales in Skyrim into sheaf.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Straw Bale Into Sheaf
Version: 1.0
Date: 8/14/2016
Category: Models and Textures
Author(s): zelazkoo
Source: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77893

Description
===========
Another mod aimed at bringing more realism into Skyrim. Turns all straw
bales in Skyrim into sheaves. [s]No bale is possible without baler machine.
Have the dwemer left any for Nords to use?[/s] This mod is not about logic
but avoiding anachronism.



Install - Manual
==============
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder)\Skyrim\Data\


Uninstall - Manual
================
1. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

meshes\clutter\hay\haybale01.nif


Incompatibility
==============
Mods that replace the sheaf or bale mesh like Oh Hay There - A simple re-texture for hay.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77871/?

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
Some sheaves will be misaligned in case where one bale was on top of the
other. This correction needs esp plugin I went for the broke lazy so
deal with it.
[spoiler]Maybe in future I will make the esp version with corrections...[/spoiler]

History
=======
1.0, 2016/08/14 - Initial release.



Credits
=======
-Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
-Bethesda for creating sheaf resource (mesh) in Skyrim



Tools Used
==========
7-Zip - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=15579
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but don't complain to me if it
doesn't work or your PC blows up.
author: zelazko
